useCase.name: Order Food Online
useCase.description: This use case describes the process of ordering food online.

mainSequence.step: Display the main menu to the User.
Select Menu Option 1 or 2, and choose between 'Me' or 'Other' at the Menu.
Display the profile information for the selected user.
Enter the quantity of items to order.
If no selection is made, go back to the menu.
